alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 4:21PM CST until March 08 at 10:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Trempealeau River at Arcadia affecting Trempealeau and Buffalo Counties. For the Trempealeau River...including Arcadia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trempealeau River at Arcadia. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. A few streets are affected by high water, and pumping operations begin. At 9.0 feet, High water causes flooding of streets near Ashley Furniture. At 10.0 feet, Water flows over a part of the levee on the west bank and causes flooding along Willow St. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is near crest and will fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.6 feet on 07/20/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 430 AM CST.
